section.title: Load Balancer Definitions in Control Planes
section.para: Starting in &product;, a load-balancer may be defined within a control-plane object, and referenced by name from a network-groups object. The following example shows load balancer extlb defined in control-plane cp1 and referenced from the EXTERNAL-API network group. See section Load balancers for a complete description of load balance attributes.
section.screen:
network-groups: - name: EXTERNAL-API load-balancers: - extlb
control-planes: - name: cp1 load-balancers: - provider: ip-cluster name: extlb external-name: tls-components: - default roles: - public cert-file: cp1-extlb-cert
